column4: anyone want to give me and last minute tips before i try to installl ubuntu for the first time
prepare for the easiest install in a lifetime..
are you just wanting to install a workstation?
cause I have never done it before and I chose the OEM...30 min later I was done..
yeah....there are the OEM and a server version
is the difference that server just comes with apache etc as default?
I have no experience with the others....I know the server version is text only. If you choose a server install and choose LAMP it will install apache mysql and php
but the OEM is the one I am using as a first timer...it works like a breeze
but then again...I am a total newb..
ahh yeah ok.. i'm going to use oem..
back in however long it takes me to sort out :)
I am still trying to learn the commands in linux...16 years of DOS and Windows dont help you here ;)
